alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 1:56PM MST until December 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between midday Wednesday and early Friday of 3 to 6 inches. Wind gusts 15 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Jackson Hole and Star Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. The steadiest snow is expected late Wednesday afternoon and evening, and again on Thursday afternoon into the evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be impacted by patchy blowing snow and reduced visibility north and west of Jackson. The hazardous conditions may impact the evening commute both days.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
